title: Yvette Cooper
summary: Yvette Cooper (born 20 March 1969) is a British politician serving as Shadow Home Secretary since November 2021, and previously from 2011 to 2015. A member of the Labour Party, she has been Member of Parliament (MP) for Normanton, Pontefract and Castleford, previously Pontefract and Castleford, since 1997.
